short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Send private and secure emails; look for the green lock to know your email can only be read by recipient.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enables completely transparent end-to-end security on top of Gmail.

Just search for the green lock to know you are protected.

More info and FAQ in our website https://shwyz.ca
